amendment.description: To provide funding for the relending program to resolve ownership and succession on farmland.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1067 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 1. Record Vote Number: 336.

action.text: Amendment SA 1067 proposed by Senator Jones to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6186, S6187; text: CR S6186) To provide funding for the relending program to resolve ownership and succession on farmland.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1067 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 1. Record Vote Number: 336.
